message: Let's start with a fair split.  I think 60/40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 52.5/47.5 split.
I understand your point about being realistic.  Let's try a 55/45 split this time. I think it's a good compromise.
This is getting ridiculous. It's time to be fair. I propose a 50/50 split.
